Event.Name: SunAshtakavargaYoga2
Event.ConditionDescription: if the bindus are 3 or 4 and the Sun does not happen to be in his place of exaltation or own sign.
Event.Description: The person will always be ill

Event.Name: SunAshtakavargaYoga3
Event.ConditionDescription: if the Sun as ascendant lord is in a sign having more than 5 or 6 bindus.
Event.Description: One will be blessed with all the paraphernalia of political power and eminence

Event.Name: SunAshtakavargaYoga5
Event.ConditionDescription: if the sign occupied by the Sun has more than 5 bindus and happens to be a Kendra or Trikona.
Event.Description: The native's father may meet with death near a burial ground, or a mountain, or a fireplace, or sea

Event.Name: SunAshtakavargaYoga6
Event.ConditionDescription: if the Sun is in a quadrant (Kendra) or a trine (Trikona), which should also be a friendly sign associated with 3, 4, or 5 bindus.
Event.Description: The father expires in the 17th year of the native

Event.Name: SunAshtakavargaYoga7
Event.ConditionDescription: if the Sun is in the 9th with Rahu, and the number of bindus is 3.
Event.Description: Death of the father happens after five years

Event.Name: SunAshtakavargaYoga8
Event.ConditionDescription: Sun in the 5th having 3 bindus, in association with Moon, Mars, and Saturn,
Event.Description: destroys parents and brothers

Event.Name: SunAshtakavargaYoga9
Event.ConditionDescription: if the Sun is in the 3rd, with 3 or 4 bindus aspected by malefics from the 9th.
Event.Description: Death of the father takes place after the 20th year

Event.Name: SunAshtakavargaYoga10
Event.ConditionDescription: When the Sun is in the 6th in a Rasi having 4 bindus, and aspected by Jupiter,
Event.Description: father dies after the 25th year

Event.Name: SunAshtakavargaYoga11
Event.ConditionDescription: Sun is in a trine or angle and has five or more bindus.
Event.Description: Death of the father will happen between the 30th and 36th year

Event.Name: MoonAshtakavargaYoga1A
Event.ConditionDescription: If the Rasi occupied by the Moon is associated with 1,2,3 bindus (in his own Ashtakavarga),
Event.Description: the person suffers from distress, diseases, litigation and ill-health.

Event.Name: MoonAshtakavargaYoga1B
Event.ConditionDescription: If the Rasi occupied by the Moon is associated with 1,2,3 bindus (in his own Ashtakavarga), AND if two or three planets join the Moon
Event.Description: the native is likely to pass away in his 37th year

Event.Name: MoonAshtakavargaYoga2B
Event.ConditionDescription: The Moon in the 6th or 11th associated with more than 6 bindus
Event.Description: is found to make one rich

Event.Name: MoonAshtakavargaYoga4
Event.ConditionDescription: One born when the Moon is in a Kendra and associated with 7 to 8 bindus
Event.Description: becomes highly learned, powerful, a ruler and endowed with wealth.

Event.Name: MoonAshtakavargaYoga6
Event.ConditionDescription: If Rahu is in the 2nd and the Moon occupies the 7th or 8th with 1, 2, or 3 bindus.
Event.Description: The mother suffers from frequent ill-health.

Event.Name: MoonAshtakavargaYoga7
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mars with less bindus is in the 4th or 8th from the Moon.
Event.Description: Separation from the mother takes place.

Event.Name: MoonAshtakavargaYoga8
Event.ConditionDescription: If the Moon occupies a Kendra or the 12th with 1 to 3 bindus, and the 4th house is joined by malefic planets.
Event.Description: Mother's death is likely in the 36th year.

Event.Name: MoonAshtakavargaYoga9
Event.ConditionDescription: If the waning Moon in Lagna is associated with 1, 2, 3, or no bindus.
Event.Description: Indicates danger from weapons and poisonous insects, with a likelihood of the mother's death.

Event.Name: MoonAshtakavargaYoga10
Event.ConditionDescription: If the 4th house is occupied by malefics and the Moon is in Lagna with few bindus.
Event.Description: Mother's death can take place in the 36th year.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga2
Event.ConditionDescription: When Mars is exalted or in his own sign occupying the 9th, 4th, 10th or 1st house, associated with 8 bindus.
Event.Description: The person becomes a millionaire.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga3
Event.ConditionDescription: When Sagittarius, Leo, Aries, Cancer or Capricorn happens to be the ascendant and Mars occupies it, associated with 4 bindus.
Event.Description: One will become a ruler.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga4
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mars has 8 bindus, depending upon the strength of Mars.
Event.Description: One rises to a high position such as head of a small principality or a high government official or even a minister

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga5
Event.ConditionDescription: If in addition to acquiring 8 bindus, Mars happens to be in the ascendant or the 10th or the 2nd.
Event.Description: He will become a king or head of a government.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga6
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mars has 8 bindus and Mars happens to be in the ascendant or the 10th or the 2nd and Mars is also exalted or in his own house.
Event.Description: The person becomes a powerful ruler.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga7
Event.ConditionDescription: if Mars, associated with 4 or more bindus occupies the Lagna, Chandra Lagna, or the 9th or the 10th from Moon house which should also happen to be his own or exaltation sign.
Event.Description: One will become wealthy

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga8
Event.ConditionDescription: Mars as lord of the 2nd in the 6th endowed with 6 bindus
Event.Description: Can confer on a person all the comforts of life but he will always have plenty of enemies to contend with.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga9
Event.ConditionDescription: Mars as lord of Lagna or the 8th, is in Lagna, or Chandra Lagna or in the 10th or 9th from Moon, associated with no or a few bindus and joined by a debilitated or inimical planet
Event.Description: One will be an adopted son.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga10A
Event.ConditionDescription: Mars with 6 bindus occupies the 6th, 8th or 12th being debilitated or combust and joined by waxing Moon
Event.Description: One will have no brothers.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga10B
Event.ConditionDescription: Mars with 6 bindus occupies the 6th, 8th or 12th being debilitated or combust and joined by waxing Moon and Mars is strong
Event.Description: one becomes a head of a town or a municipal corporator.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga11
Event.ConditionDescription: Mars, possessing 4 bindus, occupies the 5th, Lagna, or a quadrant
Event.Description: one becomes a head of a town or a municipal corporator.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga12A
Event.ConditionDescription: if Mars or Saturn with 1 to 3 bindus occupy the 3rd house and the lord of the 3rd or the lord of the sign occupied by Karaka (Mars) is in an even sign
Event.Description: There will also be loss of sisters (by abortion to mother)

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga12B
Event.ConditionDescription: if Mars or Saturn with 1 to 3 bindus occupy the 3rd house and the lord of the 3rd or the lord of the sign occupied by Karaka (Mars) is in an odd sign
Event.Description: There will also be loss of brothers (by abortion to mother)

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga13A
Event.ConditionDescription: if the ascendant is a movable sign, and Saturn with 1 to 3 bindus occupies a common sign OR If the ascendant is a common sign and Saturn is in a movable sign
Event.Description: No brothers or sisters will be born

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga13B
Event.ConditionDescription: If the ascendant is a fixed sign and Saturn or Mars is associated with 1 to 3 bindus
Event.Description: there will be loss of father and brothers.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga14
Event.ConditionDescription: The ascendant being a movable sign and Saturn with 5 bindus is in a movable or fixed sign
Event.Description: one becomes not only wealthy but also possessed of brothers.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga15
Event.ConditionDescription: When the Lagna is a fixed sign and the 3rd lord is in a common sign with 5 bindus
Event.Description: The person will live long, enjoy all the pleasures of life, and will possess a number of brothers.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga16
Event.ConditionDescription: Mars is in the 3rd with 5 or more bindus associated with or aspected by a benefic
Event.Description: One will have a number of brothers.

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga17
Event.ConditionDescription:
(a) Mars, devoid of bindus and joined by the lord of the 7th, is debilitated or combust or is in association with malefics, (b) when Mars and Saturn occupy Lagna, associated with 1 to 3 bindus, (c) when Mars endowed with 1 to 3 bindus is in the 8th from Saturn or vice versa, (d) when Mars is in the 8th from Saturn and malefics are in the 3rd from Lagna, both with 1 to 3 bindus.
In the combinations, the sign in which Mars is placed as well as the sign in which the malefics are placed should have 1 to 3 bindus.
Event.Description: There will be loss of brothers

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga19
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mars is in the 3rd house associated with three bindus
Event.Description: The number of brothers will be 9

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga22
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mars occupies Kendra or Trikona identical with Sagittarius, Aries, or Capricorn associated with 4 bindus
Event.Description: becomes head of a state

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga23
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mars with 5 or more bindus is in conjunction with or in mutual aspect with Saturn
Event.Description: becomes head of a state

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga24
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mars with 1 to 3 bindus is in conjunction with or aspected by Mercury
Event.Description: Poverty and sorrow will be the result

Event.Name: MarsAshtakavargaYoga25
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mars with 5 or more bindus joins or is aspected by the Moon
Event.Description: One becomes head of two or three villages

Event.Name: MercuryAshtakavargaYoga3
Event.ConditionDescription: When Mercury with 1 to 3 bindus is in the 6th or 8th devoid of benefic aspects
Event.Description: One becomes a hypocrite and crooked in outlook

Event.Name: MercuryAshtakavargaYoga4
Event.ConditionDescription: Associated with 1 to 3 bindus, if Mercury occupies the 6th, 8th or 12th in conjunction with Venus
Event.Description: One becomes uneducated

Event.Name: MercuryAshtakavargaYoga5
Event.ConditionDescription: When Mercury is in a trine or a quadrant associated with 5 bindus, and joined or aspected by Jupiter or Saturn
Event.Description: The person becomes highly learned in the Vedas

Event.Name: MercuryAshtakavargaYoga6
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mercury with 5 bindus is in the 4th or 6th from Saturn and Jupiter occupies or aspects the 2nd
Event.Description: Great proficiency in astrology is indicated

Event.Name: MercuryAshtakavargaYoga7
Event.ConditionDescription: When Mercury, with 5 bindus, conjoins Jupiter or is in association with or aspected by Mars
Event.Description: One becomes a great logician

Event.Name: MercuryAshtakavargaYoga8
Event.ConditionDescription: If Ketu, associated with 3 bindus (in Mercury’s Ashtakavarga), is in the 5th house or with the lord of the 5th house
Event.Description: One becomes an expert in astrology and allied subjects

Event.Name: MercuryAshtakavargaYoga9
Event.ConditionDescription: Disposition of Mercury with 4 bindus in a sign of Mars and in a Navamsa of Venus, aspected by Jupiter
Event.Description: One becomes a litterateur

Event.Name: MercuryAshtakavargaYoga12A
Event.ConditionDescription: if the lord of the sign occupied by Mercury happens to be placed in a trine or quadrant associated with more bindus
Event.Description: Fame, intelligence and learning

Event.Name: MercuryAshtakavargaYoga12B
Event.ConditionDescription: if the lord of the sign occupied by Mercury happens to be placed in the 6th, 8th or 12th
Event.Description: one will have break in education

Event.Name: GajakesariYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If Jupiter is in a kendra from the Moon the combination goes under the name Gajakesari.
Event.Description: Many relations, polite and generous, builder of villages and towns or magistrate over them; will have a lasting reputation even long after death

Event.Name: SunaphaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If there are planets (excepting the Sun) in the second house from the Moon, Sunapha is caused.
Event.Description: Self-earned property, king, ruler or his equal, intelligent, wealthy and good reputation.

Event.Name: AnaphaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If there are planets in the 12th from the Moon, Anapha Yoga is formed.
Event.Description: Well-formed organs, majestic appearance, good reputation, polite, generous, self-respect, fond of dress and sense pleasures. In later life, renunciation and austerity

Event.Name: DhurdhuraYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If there are planets on either side of the Moon, the combination goes under the name of Dhurdhura.
Event.Description: The native is bountiful. He will be blessed with much wealth and conveyances.

Event.Name: KemadrumaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: When there are no planets on both sides of the Moon, Kemadruma Yoga is formed
Event.Description: The person will be dirty, sorrowful, doing unrighteous deeds, poor, dependent, a rogue and a swindler

Event.Name: ChandraMangalaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mars conjoins the Moon this yoga is formed.
Event.Description: Earnings through unscrupulous means, a seller of women, treating mother harshly and doing mischief to her and other relatives

Event.Name: AdhiYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If benefics are situated in the 6th, 7th and 8th from the Moon, the combination goes under the name of Adhi Yoga
Event.Description: The person will be polite and trustworthy, will have an enjoyable and happy life, surrounded by luxuries and affluence, will inflict defeats on his enemies, will be healthy and will live long.

Event.Name: ChatussagaraYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Chatussagara Yoga is caused when all the kendras are occupied by planets
Event.Description: The person will earn good reputation, be an equal to a ruler, have a long and prosperous life, be blessed with good children and health and his name will travel to the confines of the four oceans

Event.Name: VasumathiYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If benefics occupy the upachayas (3,6,10 and 11) either from the ascendant or from the Moon, the combination goes under the name of Vasumathi Yoga.
Event.Description: The person will not be a dependent but will always command plenty of wealth. oceans

Event.Name: RajalakshanaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Jupiter, Venus, Mercury and the Moon should be in Lagna or they should be placed in kendra.
Event.Description: The native will possess an attractive appearance and he will be endowed with all the good qualities of high personages.

Event.Name: VanchanaChoraBheethiYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: The Lagna is occupied by a malefic with Gulika in a trine: or Gulika is associated with the lords of Kendras and Thrikonas; or the lord of Lagna is combined with Rahu, Saturn or Kethu.
Event.Description: The native will always entertain feelings of suspicion towards others around him. He is afraid of being cheated, swindled and robbed.

Event.Name: SakataYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: The Moon in the 12th, 6th or 8th from Jupiter gives rise to Sakata Yoga
Event.Description: The native loses fortune and may regain it. He will be ordinary nd insignificant. He will suffer from poverty, privation and misery. He will be stubborn and hated by relatives.

Event.Name: AmalaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: The 10th from the Moon or Lagna should be occupied by a benefic planet
Event.Description: The person will achieve lasting fame and reputation. His character will be spotless and he will lead a prosperous life.

Event.Name: ParvataYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Benefics being disposed in Kendras, the 6th and 8th houses should either be unoccupied or occupied by benefic planets. This combination goes under the name of Parvata Yoga
Event.Description: The person will become wealthy, prosperous, liberal, charitable, humorous and head of a town or village. He will be passionate also.

Event.Name: KahalaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Lords of the fourth and ninth houses should be in Kendras from each other and the lord of Lagna should be strongly disposed.
Event.Description: The native will be stubborn, not well informed, daring, head of a small army and a few villages

Event.Name: VesiYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If planets other than the Moon occupy the 2nd from the Sun, Vesi Yoga is formed.
Event.Description: The person will be fortunate, happy, virtuous, famous and aristocratic.

Event.Name: VasiYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Planets other than the Moon occupying the 12th from the Sun gives rise to Vasi Yoga.
Event.Description: The subject will be happy, prosperous, liberal and the favourite of the ruling classes

Event.Name: ObhayachariYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If planets other than the Moon are present on either side of the Sun, Obhayachari is caused
Event.Description: The person will be an eloquent speaker. He will have well-proportioned limbs, will take delight in everything, will be liked by all. Wealthy and famous.

Event.Name: HamsaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Jupiter should occupy a Kendra which should be his own house or exaltation sign.

Event.Name: MalavyaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Venus should occupy a quadrant which should be his own or exaltation sign.
Event.Description: The person will have a well-developed physique, will be strong-minded, wealthy, happy with children and wife, will command vehicles, endowed with clean sense-organs and renowned and learned.

Event.Name: SasaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Sasa Yoga is given rise to if Saturn occupies a Kendra which should be his own or exaltation sign.
Event.Description: One born in this yoga will command good servants. His character will be questionable. He will be head of a village or a town or even a king, will covet others riches and will be wicked in disposition.

Event.Name: RuchakaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Mars should be exalted in a Kendra or occupy a Kendra which should be his own sign.
Event.Description: The person born in Ruchaka will have a strong physique, famous, well-versed in ancient lore, King or an equal to a King, conforming to traditions and customs. He will have a ruddy complexion, attractive body, charitable disposition, wealthy, long-lived and leader of an army.

Event.Name: BhadraYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: Bhadra Yoga is caused by the disposition of Mercury in a Kendra which should be identical with his own or exaltation sign.
Event.Description: The person born in Bhadra Yoga will be strong, will have a lion-like face, well-developed chest, well-proportioned limbs, will be taciturn, will help relatives and will live upto a good old age.

Event.Name: BudhaAdityaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If Mercury combines with the Sun, the combination goes under the name of Budha Aditya Yoga.
Event.Description: Highly intelligent, skilful in all works, good reputation, personal respect and surrounded by all comforts and happiness.

Event.Name: MahabhagyaYogaMale
Event.ConditionDescription: In the case of a man, when the birth is during daytime the Sun, the Moon and the Lagna should be in odd signs. In the case of women, when the birth is during night, the Sun, the Moon and Lagna must be in even signs. and MALE
Event.Description: will have good character, will be a source of pleasure to others, will be liberal, generous, famous, a ruler or an equal to him and lives to a good old age.

Event.Name: MahabhagyaYogaFemale
Event.ConditionDescription: In the case of a man, when the birth is during daytime the Sun, the Moon and the Lagna should be in odd signs. In the case of women, when the birth is during night, the Sun, the Moon and Lagna must be in even signs. and FEMALE
Event.Description: will be blessed with long-lived children and wealth and she will be of good conduct.

Event.Name: PushkalaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: The lord of the sign occupied by the Moon (who should be associated with lord of Lagna) should be in a Kendra or in the house of an intimate friend aspecting Lagna and at the same time, Lagna should be occupied by a powerful planet.
Event.Description: Wealthy, sweet speech, famous, honored by the king and a lord

Event.Name: LakshmiYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If the lord of Lagna is powerful and the lord of the 9th occupies own or exaltation sign identical with a Kendra or Thrikona, Lakshmi Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: The person will be wealthy, noble, learned, a man of high integrity and reputation, handsome appearance, a good ruler, and enjoying all the pleasures and comforts of life.

Event.Name: GauriYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: The lord of the Navamsa occupied by the lord of the 10th should join the 10th in exaltation and combined with the lord of Lagna.
Event.Description: The person belongs to a respectable family, owns several lands, charitable, performs, religious rites, his sons will be of good character and he will be praised by all.

Event.Name: BharathiYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: The lord of the Navamsa occupied by the lords of the 2nd, 5th and 11th should be exalted and combined with the 9th lord.
Event.Description: World famous, a reputed scholar, fond of music, romantic, handsome, attractive, religiously inclined and bewitching eyes.

Event.Name: ChapaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If the Ascendant lord is exalted and the 4th and 10th lords have interchanged houses, Chapa Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: The person will grace a King's Council, be wealthy and full of strength and an Exchequer or a Controller of treasury.

Event.Name: SreenathaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: If the exalted lord of the 7th occupies the 10th and the lord of the lOth is with the 9th lord, Sreenatha Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: The native will have on his body the insignia of Vishnu, viz., the conch, the wheel, etc.. be an agreeable speaker, godly, have a good wife and children and be loved by all.

Event.Name: LagnaMalikaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription:
House 1 If all the seven planets occupy the seven houses contiguously, reckoned from Lagna or any particular Bhava, the appropriate Malika Yoga is caused.
Twelve types of Malika Yogas, one for each Bhava, are caused. Thus the Yoga beginning from the first is Lagna Malika, the one beginning from the fifth, Putra Malika and so on. The seven planets (excluding of course Rahu and Kethu) should occupy the seven houses contiguously from a Bhava in question.
Event.Description: King, ruler or commander, wealthy.

Event.Name: DhanaMalikaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription:
House 2 If all the seven planets occupy the seven houses contiguously, reckoned from Lagna or any particular Bhava, the appropriate Malika Yoga is caused.
Twelve types of Malika Yogas, one for each Bhava, are caused. Thus the Yoga beginning from the first is Lagna Malika, the one beginning from the fifth, Putra Malika and so on. The seven planets (excluding of course Rahu and Kethu) should occupy the seven houses contiguously from a Bhava in question.
Event.Description: very wealthy, dutiful, resolute and unsympathetic

Event.Name: VikramaMalikaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: House 2 If all the seven planets occupy the seven houses contiguously, reckoned from Lagna or any particular Bhava, the appropriate Malika Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: ruler, rich, sickly, surrounded by brave men

Event.Name: SukhaMalikaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: House 2 If all the seven planets occupy the seven houses contiguously, reckoned from Lagna or any particular Bhava, the appropriate Malika Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: charitable and wealthy

Event.Name: PutraMalikaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: House 2 If all the seven planets occupy the seven houses contiguously, reckoned from Lagna or any particular Bhava, the appropriate Malika Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: highly religious and famous

Event.Name: SatruMalikaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: House 2 If all the seven planets occupy the seven houses contiguously, reckoned from Lagna or any particular Bhava, the appropriate Malika Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: greedy and somewhat poor

Event.Name: KalatraMalikaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: House 2 If all the seven planets occupy the seven houses contiguously, reckoned from Lagna or any particular Bhava, the appropriate Malika Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: coveted by women and influential

Event.Name: RandhraMalikaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: House 2 If all the seven planets occupy the seven houses contiguously, reckoned from Lagna or any particular Bhava, the appropriate Malika Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: poor and hen-pecked

Event.Name: BhagyaMalikaYoga
Event.ConditionDescription: House 2 If all the seven planets occupy the seven houses contiguously, reckoned from Lagna or any particular Bhava, the appropriate Malika Yoga is caused.
Event.Description: religious, well-to-do, mighty and good

Event.Name: KarmaMalikaYoga
Event.Description:
House 2 Definition:
Results:

Event.Name: MalikaYoga
Event.Description:
Definition:
Results: respected and virtuous

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse1Fortified
Event.ConditionDescription: House1LordInHouse1 AND If the Lagnadhipati is well disposed in Lagna
Event.Description:
The subject lives by his own exertion, will have an independent spirit and will have two wives or one married and another illegal. the person becomes famous in his own community and country.
, the results produced will be quite different from those which he would have produced by being aspected by benefics. The same rules apply to all Bhavas which should be borne in mind by every reader.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse2
Event.Description: There will be more of gains, teased or worried by enemies, good character respectable and generous hearted. Well-disposed. He will gladly discharge his duties towards his kith and kin, and will be ambitious. He will possess prominent eyes and be blessed with forethought.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse3
Event.Description: Makes one highly couragious, fortunate, reepectable, two wives, intelligent and happy. When Lagnadhipati is well disposed, the native's rise in life will be brought about by his brothers. He may become famous as a musician or a mathematician depending upon the nature of the sign and the planets involved.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse4
Event.Description: There will be happiness from parents, many brothers, materialistic, well built, fair looking and well-behaved. If the 4th lord is favourably disposed, the person will acquire considerable landed properties, specially through maternal sources. He will be rich, happy, famous and commands a number of conveyances.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse5
Event.Description: The first child does not survive, not much happiness from children, short tempered, subservient and serving others. If fortified , In the good graces of rulers or powerful political parties and likely to be absorbed into trade or diplomatic services. He will propitiate deities consistent with the indications of the fifth lord.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse6
Event.Description: In addition to the results produced by the lord of Lagna being in the third, the following may also be noted. There will be bebts but they will be liquidated when the Dasa of the Lagndhipati comes. When the lord is fortified, the native joins the army, becomes a Commander or even a Commander-in-chief provided the lord's Dasa operates at the opportune period. Or, he may become head of medical or health services or an expert physician or surgeon. Here the other influences should be suitably balanced.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse7
Event.Description: The wife does not live or there will be more than one marriage. Later in life becomes detached from worldly affairs and tries to lead an ascetic life. Depending upon other factors the subject will either be rich or poor. There will be much travelling. If well disposed, he will spend most of his time in foriegn countries and lead a licentious life. Or he will be a puppet in the hands of his parents-in-law.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse8
Event.Description: Learned, gambling tendencies, interested in occultism and mean character. If the lord is strong the native takes pride in helping others, has a number of friends, religiously inclined and will have a peaceful and sudden end.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse9
Event.Description: Generally fortunate, protector of others, religious, is a Hindu—worshipper of Vishnu, good orator, happiness on account of wife and children, and rich. Provided the lord is well disposed, he will inherit good ancestral and paternal property. The father will be famous, philanthropic and god-fearing.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse10
Event.Description: In addition to the results of the 4th house, there will be professional success, honoured by eminent men, a research scholar or specialisation in that branch of knowledge or profession which is represented by lord of Lagna and the 10th.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse11
Event.Description: In addition to the results of the 2nd house, there will always be gains in business if a businessman. The subject will not experience financial straits. He owes his prosperity to his elder brother. He will earn enormous business profits, consistent with the indications of the other planets joining the combination.

Event.Name: House1LordInHouse12
Event.Description: The same results as in the 8th are produced. In addition, there will be many losses, visiting holy places and no success in business enterprises. He will spend inherited riches on charities and other deserving causes. Emotionally balanced he will dedicate himself for public weal.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse1
Event.Description: The native becomes no doubt wealthy but he hates his own family, lacks polite manners, becomes passionate, subservient and time-serving. one will earn money by his own effort, intelligence and learning

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse1With9thOrSun
Event.ConditionDescription: House2LordInHouse1 AND if the 9th lord or the Sun has anything to do with this combination.
Event.Description: he will get inherited wealth

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse2
Event.Description: Becomes proud. The native may marry twice or thrice depending upon the strength of the seventh house. He may become childless. The position of the 2nd lord in a constellation which does not happen to be the 3rd, 5th and 7th from Janma Nakshatra is highly desirable, especially if he is otherwise fortified, i.e., joined with or aspected by benefics. The exaltation of the 2nd lord of his disposition in Lagna, the 4th, 5th, 7th, 9th or 10th, will fortify him to the extent of making him a yogakaraka. The native will be enabled to earn considerable fortune through business or other occupations consistent with the nature of the 2nd lord and 2nd house. Depending upon the nature of the aspects cast on the 2nd lord by malefic planets, the native will sustain losses. An affliction to the 2nd lord may also express itself in the shape of the subject not getting nutritious and delicious food, or his family and children suffering from constant diseases, or want of cordial relations between the native and his life-partner.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse3
Event.Description: Brave, intelligent, good-natured but depraved character. Atheistic tendencies will be rampant and he becomes addicted to luxuries. Later in life he turns out to be a miser. When the 2nd lord in the 3rd is well fortified, he will be benefited by his sisters. He will benefit by learning fine arts, viz., music and dancing. He will also indulge in propitiating Kshudra Devatas or evil spirits.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse4
Event.Description: The above results will apply in addition to the following. He will spend money for his own happiness. He will be highly frugal in dealing with money.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse4Fortified
Event.ConditionDescription: House2LordInHouse4 AND fortified
Event.Description: one will earn well as an automobile dealer or agent or an agriculturist or landlord or commission agent. He will also be benefited by his maternal relations.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse4Afflicted
Event.ConditionDescription: House2LordInHouse4 AND afflicted
Event.Description: one will have losses as an automobile dealer or agent or an agriculturist or landlord or commission agent. He will also be not benefited by his maternal relations.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse5
Event.Description: Hating family, sensual, not spending money even on children, he lacks manners and etiquette. When the 2nd lord in the 5th is well fortified there will be unexpected acquisition of wealth through lotteries, crosswords, or the favour of rulers.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse6Afflicted
Event.ConditionDescription: House2LordInHouse6 AND if the second lord joins the 6th and is afflicted
Event.Description: Income and expenditure from enemies. He will suffer from defects or diseases in the anus and thighs. black-marketing, deceit, dissimulation and by creating misunderstandings and troubles between friends and relatives and through questionable and suspicious dealings can be anticipated He will be involved in these troubles and sentenced for such crimes as breach of trust, forgeries and perjuries.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse6Fortified
Event.ConditionDescription: House2LordInHouse6 AND if the second lord joins the 6th and is well fortified
Event.Description: Income and expenditure from enemies. He will suffer from defects or diseases in the anus and thighs. Amassing of wealth by black-marketing, deceit, dissimulation and by creating misunderstandings and troubles between friends and relatives and through questionable and suspicious dealings can be anticipated

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse7
Event.Description: Likely to become a healer. Laxity of morals will mark both husband and wife. He will waste much money on the gratification of the senses. When the second lord who joins the 7th with the 7th lord is strong there will be influx of wealth through foreign sources. The native will undertake journeys to foreign countries and do business. When the Rasi, Navamsa or the constellation held by the 2nd lord happens to be a feminine one, then he will benefit by contact with women.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse8
Event.Description: Will have very little or no happiness from wife or husband. Misunderstandings with elder brothers. Gets landed properties. When the 2nd lord is strong, there will be influx as well as loss of wealth. Actual observation reveals that under such a combination, there will hardly be any earnings, but inherited or accumulated wealth will disappear.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse9
Event.Description: Skilful, ill-health in young age but healthy afterwards, will possess lot of wealth and become happy. When the 2nd lord is well fortified and the 9th lord is in Lagna, the native will have good inheritance. There will also be benefits through different sources according to the nature of the sign and nakshatra held by the 2nd lord.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse10
Event.Description: Respect from elders and superiors, learned, wealthy and he earns by his own exertions. The native will take to a number of useful avocations. He will do business or take to agriculture and also engage himself in philosophical lectures and dissertations, and thereby benefit financially. Here again, the constellation and the sign held by the 2nd lord determine the exact nature and sources of earnings. Powerful afflictions will cause loss from the very same sources.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse11
Event.Description: Health will be bad during childhood, earns considerable wealth but becomes unscrupulous. When well fortified, one earns by lending money or as a banker or by running a boarding house.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse12
Event.ConditionDescription: If the second lord is NOT afflicted
Event.Description: The native becomes a respectable man. In all probability he will be a government servant, and will be deprived of the happiness of elder brother. The income will be through ecclesiastical sources.

Event.Name: House2LordInHouse12Afflicted
Event.ConditionDescription: House2LordInHouse12 AND If the second lord is afflicted
Event.Description: The native becomes a respectable man. In all probability he will be a government servant, and will be deprived of the happiness of elder brother. He will lose money through ecclesiastical sources.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse1
Event.Description: Earns livelihood by self-exertion, becomes vindictive, lean and tall body, brave and courageous, always sickly and serving others. When well fortified he will become an expert in dancing, music and acting, and the means of livelihood will be primarily fine arts. He will earn a good name as an actor.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse2
Event.Description: This is an unfavourable position as it makes the subject rather unscrupulous unless there are other favourable combinations. He will make advances on the women and wealth of others. Likes mean deeds and is generally devoid of happiness. He is likely to lose his younger brothers.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse3
Event.Description: Brave, surrounded by friends, relatives, blessed with good children, wealthy, happy and contented. The 3rd lord well disposed in the 3rd, 6th or 11th indicates a number of younger brothers. When the 3rd lord happens to be Mars and occupies the 3rd, then, generally, the native will lose all his younger brothers. Saturn will also give similar effects. The Sun in a similar position will kill elder brothers.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse4
Event.Description: life will be happy on the whole. He becomes rich and learned. But the wife will be cruel-hearted and mean.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse4Strong9th
Event.ConditionDescription: House3LordInHouse4 AND if the 9th lord is strong.
Event.Description: He will have step-brothers

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse4WeakMars
Event.ConditionDescription: House3LordInHouse4 AND When Mars is weak AND if the 3rd house is NOT beneficially disposed
Event.Description: he will lose his lands and he will have to live in others' houses.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse4Fortified
Event.ConditionDescription: House3LordInHouse4 AND When the lord of the 3rd is well fortified in the 4th and the lords of Lagna and 9th are rendered weak,
Event.Description: his brothers will survive him.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse5
Event.Description: Much pleasure will not be derived from children. Financially well off in life. Friction will prevail in the domestic life. well disposed, the native will be highly benefited by his brothers. He will carry on agricultural operations on a large scale, or he will be adopted by a rich family. He will also shine well in Government service.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse6
Event.Description: Hates brothers and relatives and difficulty through them. Becomes rich. Maternal relatives will suffer. Accepts illegal gratifications. When the 3rd lord is in the 6th, well disposed, younger brother joins the Army. One of the brothers will become a successful physician.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse6Lord3rd
Event.ConditionDescription: House3LordInHouse6 AND If the 6th lord also joins the 3rd,
Event.Description: the native becomes either a sportsman, physical culturist or an athlete.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse6Lord3rdAfflicted
Event.ConditionDescription: House3LordInHouse6 AND When the 6th and the 3rd are both afflicted
Event.Description: he will suffer from diseases and be tormented by enemies, and he will himself be deceitful.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse7
Event.Description: May incur the displeasure of rulers or authorities. Many vicissitudes in life. Much suffering in childhood. The union will be unfortunate. Danger while travelling. When the 3rd lord is in the 7th, well fortified, there will be cordial feelings between brothers. When the 7th lord is in Lagna, one of the brothers will settle in a foreign country and he will help the native.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse8
Event.Description: Involvement in a criminal case or false accusations. Trouble on account of death or bequests, marriage unfortunate, career will not be smooth, victim of misfortune. When the 3rd lord is in the 8th, he will suffer from a serious and dangerous disease and lose his younger brother.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse9
Event.Description: Fortune will improve after marriage. Father untrustworthy. Long journeys. Sudden and unexpected changes in life. When the 3rd lord is in the 9th, favourably disposed, the native's brother will inherit ancestral property. The native himself will be benefited by his brother. When afflicted, the person will have misunderstandings with his father.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse10
Event.Description: A quarrelsome and faithless wife. The native will become rich. He will be happy and intelligent. Gain from journeys connected with profession. When the 3rd lord is in the 10th, all the brother, will shine well and they will be helpful to him in all ways

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse11
Event.Description: Not a very good combination.. Earnings with effort. He becomes vindictive. The body will be unattractive and emaciated. Subservient to or dependent upon others, and liable to surfer from frequent attacks of illness.

Event.Name: House3LordInHouse12
Event.Description: Sorrow through relatives, gets fortune from marriage, seclusion. Great ups and downs. Unscrupulous father. When the 3rd lord is in the 12th, the youngest brother will be a tyrant. The native becomes poor on account of him.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse1
Event.Description: The person becomes highly learned, but will be afraid to speak in public assemblies. He is likely to lose inherited wealth. According as the fourth lord posited in Lagna is strong, middling or weak, the native will have been born in a rich, mediocre or poor family.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse2
Event.Description: He will be highly fortunate, courageous and happy. He will have a sarcastic nature. He will inherit property from maternal grandfather.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse3
Event.Description: The person will be sickly, generous, a man of character, and will acquire wealth by self-effort. He will suffer from the machinations of step-brothers and step-mother.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse4
Event.Description: Religiously inclined, will have respect for traditions. He will be rich, respected, happy and sensual.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse5
Event.Description: Loved and respected by others, devotee of Vishnu, becomes rich by self-effort. Mother comes from a respectable family. The native will acquire vehicles.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse6
Event.Description: Short-tempered and mean, he will have dissimulating habits, evil thoughts and intentions. He will always be roaming about.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse7
Event.Description: Generally happy , will command houses and lands , will eke out livelihood in distant places or near his birthplace according as the seventh happens to be a movable or fixed sign.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse8
Event.Description: The person becomes miserable. Father dies early. He will be either impotent or loose in sex-life. He is also likely to lose landed properties or face litigation.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse9
Event.Description: Generally a fortunate combination favouring happiness in regard to father and properties.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse10
Event.Description: Will have political success. He will be an expert chemist. He will vanquish his enemies and make his personality felt by the world.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse10Afflicted
Event.ConditionDescription: House4LordInHouse10 AND if the 4th lord is afflicted
Event.Description: Loss of reputation is possible

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse11
Event.Description: Self-made, generous, sickly, mother fortunate, but may have a step-mother also. Favours success in selling and buying cattle and lands.

Event.Name: House4LordInHouse12
Event.Description: Deprived of happiness and properties. Early death to mother, bad finances and generally a miserable existence.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse1Fortified
Event.ConditionDescription: House5LordInHouse1 AND If the 5th lord is favourably combined and associated,
Event.Description:
the person commands a number of servants, becomes a Judge, Magistrate or Minister empowered to punish the evil-minded. He will earn the grace of God , few children , will have foes and gives happiness to others.
If the 5th lord is afflicted, there will be no issues, will invoke kshudra devatas (evil and destructive forces), will be evil-minded and leader of a gang of deceitful persons , a tale-bearer with a sting.
If the lord is moderately good, mixed results will follow.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse1Afflicted
Event.ConditionDescription: House5LordInHouse1 AND If the 5th lord is afflicted
Event.Description:
there will be no issues, will invoke kshudra devatas (evil and destructive forces), will be evil-minded and leader of a gang of deceitful persons , a tale-bearer with a sting.
If the lord is moderately good, mixed results will follow.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse1AfflictedModerate
Event.ConditionDescription: House5LordInHouse1 AND If the 5th lord is moderately good
Event.Description: mixed results will follow.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse2
Event.Description: If the 5th lord is favourably disposed, the person will be blessed with a beautiful wife and well-behaving children. There will be gains from Government or King. He will become learned and a good astrologer. Lord weak and afflicted, Poor , loss of money through Government displeasure , will be unable to maintain his own family , will have family troubles and misunderstandings , becomes a priest in a Siva temple.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse3Fortified
Event.ConditionDescription: House5LordInHouse3 AND Favourably disposed
Event.Description: , many good children and brothers

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse3Afflicted
Event.ConditionDescription: House5LordInHouse3 AND unfavourably disposed
Event.Description: loss of children, misunderstandings with brothers and continuous occupational troubles. He will become stingy and a tale bearer.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse4
Event.Description: If favourably disposed, the person will have a few sons, one of whom will live by agriculture. The mother will live long. May become an adviser to a ruler or his preceptor. The lord, afflicted, causes death of children. The lord, moderately strong, confers daughters and no sons.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse5
Event.Description: Lord favourably disposed indicates a number of sons , becomes great in his own line of activity , otherwise he becomes an expert in Mantrasastra and befriends persons in power. He may also become an expert in mathematics or head of a religious institution. Lord afflicted, contrary results should be anticipated. Children will die, he will not keep to his word, wavering mentality and cruel.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse6
Event.Description:
If the fifth lord is favourably disposed, the maternal uncle will be a famous man. He will have enmity with his own son.
If the lord is afflicted, issues will not be born and he may have to adopt one from maternal uncle's line.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse7
Event.Description: When the lord is favourably disposed, the native's son lives abroad and attains distinction, wealth and fame. Or he will have a number of issues. He will also become renowned, learned, prosperous, greatly devoted to his master and possesses a charming personality. When-the lord is afflicted, there will be loss of children, one of whom will die abroad after attaining name and fame.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse8
Event.Description: Paternal property will be lost due to debts. There will be extinction of the family. He will suffer from lung troubles. He will be peevish, unhappy but not poor.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse9
Event.ConditionDescription: House2LordInHouse4 AND fortified
Event.Description: He will become a teacher or a preceptor. Renovates ancient temples, wells, choultries and gardens. One of the sons attains distinction as an orator or author.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse9Afflicted
Event.ConditionDescription: House2LordInHouse4 AND afflicted
Event.Description: he will earn divine wrath and consequent destruction of fortune.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse10
Event.Description: If the lord is beneficially disposed, a Raja Yoga is formed. Acquires landed property , earns the goodwill of the rulers, constructs temples and performs religious sacrifices , one of the sons becomes a gem of the family. If aspected by the Sun the native may join the intelligence department. If the lord is afflicted, faces the wrath of the rulers and contrary results will happen.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse11
Event.Description: Benefits through sons and success in all undertakings, becomes rich and learned and helps others, will have a number of sons, becomes an author.

Event.Name: House5LordInHouse12
Event.Description: Quest for knowing the Ultimate Reality will be pronounced. He will lead a life of non-attachment, becomes spiritual, moves from one place to another and ultimately attains Moksha.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse1Fortified
Event.ConditionDescription: House6LordInHouse1 AND Well aspected
Event.Description: the person may Join the army as a soldier or Commander consistent with the strength or otherwise of the disposition. Or he may become a Minister of War or an official or officer concerned with prisons. He will live in the house of his maternal uncle.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse1Afflicted
Event.ConditionDescription: House6LordInHouse1 AND If the sixth lord is weak and otherwise afflicted
Event.Description: he will become a robber or a thief or leader of a criminal gang.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse2
Event.Description:
Conjoined with or aspected by benefics the native will have untold suffering in family life and deep sorrows, loss of money through enemies, defective vision, uneven teeth and stammering.
If the sixth lord is weak and otherwise ill-disposed in the 2nd, there will be loss of wife in the Dasa or Bhukti of the malefic lord.
If Venus is weak, the native will be a celibate and poverty-stricken, just able to get a morsel of food when hungry.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse3
Event.Description: The sixth lord fortified confers enmity with brothers. Or his maternal uncle befriending the native's brother works against the native's interests or the native's brother suffers from frequent ill-health. The 6th lord weak and afflicted, the native will have no younger brothers.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse4
Event.Description: Well fortified, lives in a dilapidated building. He will have breaks in education and will discard his mother. Maternal uncles will generally be land cultivators. Weak and afflicted, he will quarrel with his mother and ancestral property will be involved in debts. He will work as a menial and lead a miserable life. Troublesome home and domestic affairs and trouble through servants.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse5
Event.Description: Sickly children. The native will be adopted by his maternal uncle and become fortunate.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse6
Event.Description: Increase of cousins. Native's maternal uncle becomes famed. If in conjunction with weak Lagnadhipathi, he will suffer from an incurable disease and increase of enmity with kith and kin.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse7
Event.Description: Generally marries mother's, brother's or father's sister's daughter. The maternal uncle lives in a far-off place (or a foreign country). The wife's character will be doubtful. If the sixth lord is afflicted, he will either divorce his wife early in life or she will die. If the Rasi and Navamsa involved are hermaphrodite ones, he will have a sickly or barren wife. When Lagnadhipati joins the sixth lord in the 7th which happens to be a hermaphrodite sign, the native will be a eunuch and unable to perform the sexual act. There will also be troubles with disrespectable women.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse8
Event.Description: When fortified, he will have Madhyayu or middle life. When afflicted, he will have plenty of debts and will suffer from loathsome diseases. He will hunt after women other than his own wife and take pleasure in inflicting pain on others.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse9
Event.Description: Father becomes a judge, if the sixth lord is well fortified. The maternal uncle becomes highly fortunate. There will be misunderstandings between him and his father. There will be benefits from Gnatis or cousins. If afflicted , poverty, sinful acts, misfortunes through relatives, ungrateful towards preceptors and engaged in unrighteous deeds. If moderate , becomes a mason, timber merchant or stone cutter.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse10
Event.Description: If fortified , Sinful and destructive nature, poses as an orthodox and pious man but really unscrupulous in regard to religious matters. When the lord is weak , dismissal formidable enemies, low life or begging.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse11
Event.Description: If benefic, eldest brother will be a judge. If ordinary , an elder brother becomes a judge for some time but loses his job. If malefic , poor and wretched life , suffering on account of convictions.

Event.Name: House6LordInHouse12
Event.Description: Well disposed , difficulty and sorrow through destructive nature, causes harm to others. If afflicted , miserable, hard and wretched existence.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse1
Event.Description: The native may marry someone he has known since childhood or one who has been brought up in the same house. The wife or husband of the native will be a stable and mature person. He will be intelligent and capable of weighing the pros and cons. Afflictions to the 7th lord may entail constant travelling. If the 7th lord and Venus are afflicted, the native may be sensual and seek clandestine relationship with the opposite sex.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse2
Event.Description: The native will get wealth from women or through marriage. If afflicted, one may earn money through despicable means as trading in flesh, women, not excluding his wife. He may eat food offered at death-ceremonies (shraddha) and wander about seeking such food. If the second house is a dual sign and afflicted, more than one marriage is likely. If a maraka Dasa is on, the native may die during the period of the seventh lord. The person will have a wavering mind and will always be inclined sensually.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse3
Event.Description: This disposition gives lucky brothers who may live abroad. If afflicted the native may indulge in adultery with a brother's or sister's married partner. Affliction also gives misfortunes to co-boms. Female issues servive.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse4
Event.Description: Gives a lucky and happy married partner with many children and comforts. The native may have the benefit of high academic qualification and own many vehicles. If afflicted, domestic harmony may be spoilt through an immature and mean partner. The native may run into endless problems on account of his conveyances. If severely afflicted by the nodes and other malefics, the native's wife's character becomes questionable.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse5
Event.Description: An early marriage, the partner may hail from an affluent and well-to-do family. The wife or husband will be mature and an advantage to the native. If the 7th lord is weak, there may be no children. If severely afflicted, one may get issues through the adulterous conduct of the wife. If there are both afflictions and benefic influences on the 7th lord, the native may get only female progeny. Trouble to one's office superiors through foreign sources is likely. The native will possess good character.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse6
Event.Description: The native may have two marriages with both partners living. One may marry a cousin such as an uncle's daughter. If badly afflicted and the karaka Venus is also ill-disposed, one may suffer from impotency and many other diseases. The native's wife may be sickly and jealous by nature denying the husband happiness from marriage. If Venus is well placed but the 7th lord is afflicted, the native may suffer from piles. If Venus is weak but not afflicted, one may desert or lose one's married partner through some indiscreet act.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse7
Event.Description: If well placed, the native will have a charming and magnetic personality. Women will flock to him and seek him out for alliance. The wife or husband will be a just and honourable person coming from a family of reputation and social standing. If weak and afflicted, it gives a lonely life devoid of marriage and friends, and loss through marriage negotiations.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse8
Event.Description: When well placed, marriage may take place with relatives or the partner may be a rich person. Affliction causes the early death of partner while the native may die in distant lands. It gives a sickly and ill-tempered wife or husband leading to estrangement and separation.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse9
Event.Description: If fortified, the father may live abroad while the native may make his fortune in foreign lands. He will get an accomplished wife who will enable him to lead a righteous life. If afflicted, the father may die early. Married partner may drag the native from the right course (Dharmic) of life and he may waste away his wealth and suffer penury.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse10
Event.Description: The native may flourish in a profession abroad or his career may involve constant travelling One will get a devoted and faithful wife or husband. The wife may also be employed and contribute to the native's income. Or, she may help in the advancement of the native's career. If afflicted, wife will be avaricious and over-ambitious but without sufficient capacity. Consequently native's career may suffer and deteriorate.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse11
Event.Description: There may be more than one marriage or the native may associate with many women. If beneficially disposed, wife may hail from a rich background or bring in much wealth. If afflicted, the native may marry more than once, but one wife may outlive him.

Event.Name: House7LordInHouse12
Event.Description: There maybe more than one marriage in the native's life. He may marry a second time clandestinely while the first wife is still alive. Or, if afflicted, he may marry a second time after losing the first wife by death or separation. But if the affliction is severe, the wife or husband may die or separate soon after marriage and there may be no second marriage. Death may occur while travelling or abroad. If both karaka and the 7th lord are weak, the native may only dream of women but never marry. The native's wife may hail from a servant's family. He will be close-fisted and generally poor.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse1
Event.Description: Penury and heavy debts will befall the native who has the 8th lord placed in the Ascendant with the Ascendant lord. Misfortune will follow him at every step. If the 8th lord is weak or placed in the 6th, 8th or 12th from Navamsa Lagna, the intensity of misfortune is reduced. If the 8th lord is severely afflicted the native will suffer bodily complaints such as disease and disfiguration. His constitution will be weak and he will have no bodily comforts. He will be the target of the displeasure of his superiors and higher-ups. Trouble from Government will cause him worries.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse2
Event.Description: The lord of the 8th house in conjunction with the 2nd lord in the 2nd house brings in troubles and problems of all sorts. The native suffers from eye and tooth troubles. He will have to eat unhealthy and tasteless or putrid foods. His domestic life will be filled with discontent and quarrels. His wife will not understand him. This may lead to estrangement and even separation. If longevity is good, he may suffer some severe illness. If the 8th lord is in the 6th, 8th or 12th from Navamsa Lagna, the intensity of the results will be reduced in degree.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse3
Event.Description: If the lord of the 8th house combines with the lord of the 3rd in the 3rd, the third house significations suffer. The native's ears may cause problems or he may go deaf. Misunderstandings will crop up with brothers and sisters leading to quarrels. The native will be beset by all sorts of fears and mental anguish. He may imagine things and suffer from hallucinations. He may involve himself in debts and get into trouble thereby. If malefics afflict the 8th lord in the 3rd with the 3rd lord, the sufferings of the native will be unbearable. But if the 8th iord combines with the 6th or 12th lords, benefic results may come by. He may get a monetary windfall through writing or through the agency of a co born.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse4
Event.Description: If the iord of the 8th house joins the 4th lord in the 4th house, the native's mental peace will be shattered Domestic bickerings, financial and other problems will increase. Mother's health may suffer and cause great concern. The native may be beset with problems regarding his house, land and conveyance. If the affliction is heavy his land and immovable property may slip from his hands due to circumstances beyond his control. His conveyances may get lost or be destroyed. His pets may contract diseases and die. Malefics furthering the affliction may force him to seek his fortune abroad where he will meet with all sons of troubles and losses. Reverses in profession and the displeasure of superiors are also likely.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse5
Event.Description: If the lord of the 8th is in the 5th with the 5th lord, the children of the native may get into trouble. They may commit some crime and invite situations that could affect the native's reputation. Or the native and his father may develop misunderstandings. The native's child may fall sick and suffer thereby. If the affliction is heavy, a child may die as soon as it is born or cause much grief to the native due to some incurable physical affliction or mental retardation. The native may also suffer much bodily ill-health. If the 8th lord is in the 6th, 12th or 8th from Navamsa Lagna, the evil results are greatly mitigated. But if fortified in a kendra (quadrant) or trikona (trine), the evil results are intensified. Since the 5th house is the buddhisthana, the native may also suffer nervous debility or breakdown or mental aberration. When the 9th lord conjoins the 8th lord in the 5th house and the Lagna lord is debilitated, the native has neither knowledge nor wealth , he is hostile, lustful and ill-temprered. He tends to be crafty, reviles God and pious men and is himself treated with contempt by his wife and children.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse6
Event.Description: If the lord of the 8th house joins the 6th lord in the 6th house, a Rajayoga results. Material affluence, fame and acquisition of objects desired are the good results. But because the 6th house is the house of disease the native may suffer ill-health. If afflicted, the native suffers loss of money through theft and trouble through courts and the police. The evil is intensified if the 8th lord is in a kendra or trikona. The native's maternal uncle may suffer much trouble. If the 6th lord is fortified, he is able to overcome all his troubles and emerge victor. No attempts made by his ill-wishers and enemies to harm him will succeed.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse7
Event.Description: The lord of the 8th house placed in the 7th house with the 7th lord curtails longevity. The native's wife may suffer ill-heaith. !f afflicted, the native will also suffer from disease. He may go abroad where he will meet with ill-health and problems. If the 7th and 8th lords are strong, the native will undertake foreign journeys on diplomatic missions and distinguish himself.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse8
Event.Description: If the lord of the 8th house occupies the 8th house in strength, the native lives long enjoying happiness. He will acquire lands, conveyance, power and position through the merit acquired in former lives. If the 8th lord is weak, he may have no serious troubles but may not also enjoy any luck or good fortune of significance. The father of the native may die or pass through some crisis. If the 8th lord is afflicted, the native will fail in his undertakings. He will be prompted to do the wrong things and thereby suffer loss.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse9
Event.Description: If the lord of the 8th house joins the 9th lord in the 9th house with malefics, the native may lose his father's property. Misunderstandings with father may arise. If the Sun, the natural significator of father is afflicted, father may die during the period of the 9th lord. If conjoined with benefics, the native acquires his father's property. Relations with father will be harmonious. If the 9th lord is weak, the native suffers all kinds of hardships, misery and unhappiness. His friends and kinsmen may desert him while his superiors will find fault with him. If the 8th lord is in the 6th, 8th or 12th from Navamsa Lagna, the evil results will be greatly reduced.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse10
Event.Description: If the lord of the 8th house is in the 10th house with the 10th lord, the native has slow advancement in career. He faces obstacles and impediments in his activities. In the appropriate period he may be superseded by his subordinates and his merit may go unnoticed. He may resort to deceit and unrighteous means to gain his ends. His thinking will be clouded and his actions will invite the wrath of the government or the law. He may suffer poverty. If the 2nd lord is also afflicted and joins the 8th lord, his reputation may suffer due to involvement in huge debts and inability to repay them. If the 8th lord is placed in the 6th, 8th or 12th from Navamsa Lagna, the intensity of the evil is greatly reduced. The 8th lord in the 10th may also confer unexpected gains due to the death of the superiors or elders.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse11
Event.Description: If the lord of the 8th house combines with the 11th lord in the 11 th house, there may be trouble to close friends. Elder brother may pass through a difficult time. Relations with him will be strained and troubled. Or the elder brother may cause anguish to the native and his family by his unscrupulous behaviour and conduct. Business may suffer losses and run into debts. If benefic planets influence the combinations there will be troubles but the native gets help from friends and elder brother to overcome them. Afflictions will aggravate the malefic results.

Event.Name: House8LordInHouse12
Event.Description: The position of the 8th lord in the 12th house with the 12th lord gives rise to a Rajayoga. If benefics join the 8th lord, unfavourable results may be expected. Treachery of friends will result in many problems and grief. Unexpected expenditure will arise and there may be pecuniary losses. If the 8th lord is in the 12th house and the 12th lord is favourably placed in a trine or quadrant, the native will gain in religious learning and piety. Some post or seat of authority may be thrust on him with all its attendant paraphernalia. If afflicted by malefics, the native may resort to vicious acts clandestinely. Such acts would include rape, adultery, conterfeiting of money (the 12th house is the house of secrecy end deceit. The 8th house signifies sudden gains of money) and smuggling activities.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse1
Event.Description: When the ninth lord is placed in the first house, the native becomes a self-made man. He earns much money througn his own efforts. If the 9th lord combines with the Lagna lord in the first house and associates with or is aspected by a benefic planet, the native is fortunate with riches and happiness.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse2
Event.Description: When the ninth lord is placed in the 2nd house beneficially, the native's father is a rich and influential man. The native acquires wealth from the father. Malefics influencing the ninth lord in the 2nd house ruin or destroy paternal property.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse3
Event.Description: If the lord of the ninth is placed in the 3rd, the native makes his fortune through writing, speeches and oratorial abilities. The native's father will be a man of moderate means while the native advances his fortune through his co-borns. If malefics afflict the ninth lord in the 3rd house, the native may land in trouble through his writings which may be irrational and even obscene depending upon the nature of affliction. He may be forced to sell his paternal property because of troubles occurring through his writings.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse4
Event.Description: The ninth lord in the 4th house gives vast landed properties and beautiful bungalows. Or the native may earn through estate and land dealings. His mother will be a rich and fortunate woman. He will inherit his father's immovable properties. If the ninth lord is afflicted in the 4th house, the native may not have any domestic unhappiness. His early life will be crossed by miseries due to a hard-hearted father or disharmony between parents. If Rahu afflicts, mother may be a divorcee or living separately from his father.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse5
Event.Description: The ninth lord in the fifth house gives a prosperous and famous father. The native's sons may also be very fortunate in life and enjoy success and distinction.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse6
Event.Description: The ninth lord in the sixth house gives a sickly father afflicted with chronic diseases. If benefics flank such a sixth house, the native may gain wealth through successful termination of father's legal problems, and by way of compensation, costs, etc. If malefics afflict the ninth lord in the sixth house, the native's attempts to make his fortune may be frustrated through litigation involving his father or debts contracted by him.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse7
Event.Description: The native may go abroad and prosper there. His father may also prosper in foreign lands. He will get a noble and lucky wife. If ascetic yogas are present in the chart, the native may seek spiritual guidance and fulfilment abroad. If asubhayogas spoil the ninth lord, the father may meet with his death abroad.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse8
Event.Description: The native may lose his father early in life. If malefics afflict the eighth house in such a case, he may suffer severe poverty and heavy responsibility due to father's death If benefics influence the ninth lord, the native may inherit substantial paternal property. Afflictions may cause the native to abandon traditions or damage religious institutions and trusts set up by the family.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse9
Event.Description: The ninth lord in the ninth house gives a long-lived and prosperous father. The native will be religiously inclined and be charitable. He will travel abroad and earn money and distinction thereby. If afflicted by malefics or if the 9th lord occupies the 6th, 8th or 12th from Navamsa Lagna, the native's father will die early.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse10
Event.Description: If the ninth lord is in the tenth house, the native will become very famous and powerful. He will be generous and occupy posts of authority. He will earn much wealth and acquire every kind of comfort and luxury. His means of livelihood will be righteous and he will be a law abiding citizen.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse11
Event.Description: The native will be exceedingly rich. He will have powerful and influential friends. His father will be a well-known and well-placed man- If afflicted, unfaithful friends will destroy the native's wealth through selfish scheming and fraud.

Event.Name: House9LordInHouse12
Event.Description: The position of the lord of the ninth house in the twelfth house gives a poor background. The native will suffer much and will have to work very hard in life. Even then success may not come to him. He will be religious and noble but always in want. Father may die early leaving the native penniless.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse1
Event.Description: When the lord of the tenth house occupies the Ascendant, the native rises in life by sheer dint of perseverance. He will be self-employed or pursue a profession of independence. When the Lagna and 10th lord combine in the first house the native becomes very famous and a pioneer in his field of work. He founds a public institution and engages himself in social projects.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse2
Event.Description: The 10th lord in the second house makes the native fortunate. He rises well in life and makes a lot of money. He may engage himself in the family trade and develop it. If malefics afflict the 10th house he will suffer losses and be responsible for winding up the family business. He will prosper in catering and restaurant businesses.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse3
Event.Description: The native may have to travel constantly on short-journeys. He will be a speaker or writer of celebrity if the 10th lord is well-placed. His brothers may be instrumental to some extent in advancing his career. If 10th lord is in the 6th, 8th or 12th from Navamsa Lagna or in an unfriendly constellation in the 3rd house, the native's rise in life is slow and beset with obstacles. If the 3rd lord is also afflicted, rivalry between brothers may Ie3d to reversals, obstacles, etc, in the native's career.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse4
Event.Description: The native will be a lucky man and highly learned in various subjects. He will be famous both for his learning and generosity. If the 10th lord is strong, the native is respected wherever he goes and he receives royal avour. He may engage in agricultural pursuits or in dealings with immovable properties- If the 4th lord, the 9th lord and the 10th are beneficially disposed and related to one another, the native wields great political authority as a president or head of a government. If the 10th lord is depressed, eclipsed, in an inimical sign or afflicted by malefic planets, the native will lose his lands and be forced to take to a life of servitude. The same result obtains if the 10th lord conjoins the 8th lord in the 4th house in a malefic shashtyamsa.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse5
Event.Description: The native shines well as a broker and engages in speculation and similar business. If benefics join the lord of the 10th in the 5th house, the native leads a simple and pious life engaging himself in prayers and pious activities. He may become the head of an orphanage or remand home if the 10th lord occupies the 6th, 8th or 12th Navamsa.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse6
Event.Description: The person will have an occupation bearing on judiciary, prisons or hospitals. If Saturn aspects the 10th lord, he may have to work all his life in a low-paying jbb with not much prospects. If benefics aspect the 10th lord, he holds a post of authority and will be held in high esteem for his character. If Rahu or afflicted malefics are with the 10th lord, he may suffer disgrace in his career. He may be exposed to criminal action and face imprisonment.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse7
Event.Description: The 10th lord placed in the 7th house gives a mature wife who will assist the native in his work. He will travel abroad on diplomatic missions. He will be well known for his skill in talking and achieving objectives. He will make profits through partnerships and co-operative ventures. If malefics afflict the 10th lord, the native will be debased in his sexual habits and indulge in every kind of vice.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse8
Event.Description: The native has many breaks in career. If the 10th lord is fortified, he will occupy a high office in his field but only for a short time. If a malefic planet afflicts the 10th lord the person has criminal propensities and commits offences. If Jupiter influences the 10th lord by aspect or association in the 8th house, he will become a mystic or spiritual teacher. Saturn here makes the person an undertaker or otherwise employed in burning ghats, graveyards, etc.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse9
Event.Description: The 10th lord in the 9th house makes the native a spiritual stalwart. He will be a beacon light to spiritual seekers if Jupiter aspects the 10th lord. If both benefics and maiefics aspect the 10th lord, the native is generally fortunate and well-to-do. He follows a hereditary profession or that of a preacher, teacher or healer. The father of the native has a great influence on him. He will be a dutiful son and do many charitable deeds.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse10
Event.Description: If the 10th lord is strongly disposed in the 10th, the native can be highly successful in his profession and command respect and honour. If the lord is weak and afflicted, he will have no self-respect, cringing for favours. He will also be a dependent all his life. He will be fickle-minded. If the 10th lord occupies the 6th, 8th or 12th houses from Navamsa, the native's career will be routine and ordinary. If three other planets conjoin the 10th lord in the 10th house, the native becomes an ascetic.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse11
Event.Description: The person earns immense riches. Fortunate in every respect he will engage himself in meritorious deeds. He will give employment to hundreds of persons and will be endowed with a high sense of honour. He will have many friends. If the eleventh house comes under affliction, "is friends will turn enemies and cause him every sort of hardship and worry.

Event.Name: House10LordInHouse12
Event.Description: If the 10th lord occupies the twelfth house, the native will have to work in a far-off place. He will lack comforts and face many difficulties in life. If beneficially disposed, the native becomes a spiritual seeker. He will be separated from his family and wander about without success if malefics afflict the 10th lord. He will indulge in smuggling and other nefarious activities, Rahu afflicting the 10th lord makes the native a cheat and a criminal. He causes sorrow to his family and relatives.

Event.Name: House11LordInHouse1
Event.Description: The native will be born in a rich family. He will earn much wealth. According as the 11th lord in Lagna is strong, middling or weak, the native will be born in a very rich, fairly rich or well-to-do family. He will lose an elder brother early in life.

Event.Name: House11LordInHouse2
Event.Description: The native will live with his elder brothers. Benefics there give harmonious relations. Malefics cause domestic bickerings but common residence. The native will earn through commercial concerns and banking business. Business with friends will bring good profits but if malefics join, the native may suffer heavy losses on account of friends.

Event.Name: House11LordInHouse3
Event.Description: The person will be a concert-singer or musician and will earn thereby. Gain through brothers is also indicated. He will have many friends and helpful neighbours-Afflictions give contrary results.

Event.Name: House11LordInHouse4
